channel.title: Changing The 99Hp Log-In Stat To 10. (Using Pimpscape)

item.title: Changing The 99Hp Log-In Stat To 10. (Using Pimpscape)
item.dc:creator: @Scarr Scarr
item.description:
@Scarr wrote:

[code]How would I change like, when I log in, your hp is automatically 99. How would I change that? I went into player.java and added this code.

for (int i = 0; i < playerLevel.length; i++) { // Setting Levels if (i == 3) { playerLevel[i] = 10; playerXP[i] = 1155; } else { playerLevel[i] = 1; playerXP[i] = 0; } }

I want it to where my Hp is 10/10 when I log in. Not 10/99 so he’ll have 41 combat…[/code]

Read full topic
item.source: Changing The 99Hp Log-In Stat To 10. (Using Pimpscape)
